mapper.update: update pet set category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photoUrls = #{photoUrls,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, category, name, tags, price, status, photoUrls from pet
